issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Shell command "hadoop fs -put" multiple close problem

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.summary: IOUtils#copyBytes methods should not close streams that are passed in as parameters

comments.body:
I agree:
* The current logic does not meet with the Java 7 pattern. In Java 7 try-catch-resources are preferred.
* Misleading. I found some misusages that may cause double calls in InputStreams. Please see HADOOP-14691 for example.
